docna.cdata!:
Jamaica - Third Highway Project : Loan 1032
            - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Jamaica - Third Highway Project :
            Loan 1032 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Highway Project consists of:
            construction, including supervision, of three new arterial
            road sections (about 16 miles) between Spanish Town and
            Mandeville and the arterial road section from Bog Walk to
            Linstead (about 4 miles) including access roads; supply and
            installation of weighbridges for permanent vehicle weighing
            stations; supply of geotechnical equipment; technical
            assistance for transport planning, aid to the local
            construction industry, and research on road pavement design,
            evaluation, and performance.
